website_summaries.verdict: Reigns supreme at the top of our shortlist given its unique feature of post-cleanse air deodorization.
pros: Two user profiles grant a fuss-free experience for multiple users
Heat settings include heated seat, warm air dyer, and warm water stream
Lights up at night, so there's no need to turn on the main bathroom light fixtures
cons: Expensive, and some users would have liked a sensor lid
For the same price, you can buy a freestanding bidet

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased contemporary Toto S500e. Assembled, but never ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased contemporary Toto S500e. Assembled, but never used due to following deficiencies: 1. Arrived with hairline crack 2. Vertical lid movement - one side gives in with pressure (down), another fixed; maybe its a design feature to minimize shock 3. There is horizontal movement of the sit when attached to the mount. 4. Uncomfortably shaped/small
customer_reviews.author: Yepuna

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. Ihad A shoulder replacement really needed this. It is perfect except it goes off every time I walk past the bathroom. The sensor is extremely sensitive. There has to be a fix for this ?? Can anyone help with this problem, otherwise it is the best luxury I have purchased. TOTO has the best....... when we were in Hawaii was introduced to this fabulous contraption. Someone told me America is way behind in bathroom toliets, I must agree. Don’t hesitate to buy this luxury.... came in a few days and was not that hard to install Looks wonderful on our toilet. Extremely COMFORTABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Horn

customer_reviews.title: Better than my original Toto Washlet-
customer_reviews.text: Better than my original Toto Washlet- I had a Toto Washlet for the past 13 years. It was great and reliable. It finally began to malfunction - I ordered this replacement immediately! I was on the fence about the eWater; I'm very glad that i got it, it is a huge improvement over the original. I was worried that the washlet would trigger ewater every time i walked into my small bathroom - It does not. It only triggers if i step directly in front of it. The few times that it does trigger is no big deal; it is very quick and quiet. I am impressed at the improvements made over my earlier model.
customer_reviews.author: CoconutGrover

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable experience
customer_reviews.text: Just having a seat that can do so much makes my bathroom experience great. The heated seat relaxes me. Knowing that I have sprays and a dryer gives me a clean feeling after use. Overall this product is great and an immediate show-off when guests come over to my house. Highly recommended and I will get an additional Washlet for my guest bathroom once I add another GFCI outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Power Button Issue
customer_reviews.text: This Toto Washlet seemed nicer than the S300 model we had BUT IT'S DEAD NOW. Contacting Toto for assistance. Update! So there is a power button on the remote which is on the back side. I don't know how mine got turned off, but I guess it did. So after holding in the power button for about five seconds, the washlet came back to life. I am sooooo relieved. To not have a washlet is to be a barbarian.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed, difficult to install...returned it after installing
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. First, the installation instructions are horrible. Second, it didn't fit our plumbing and required a hex nipple adapter, third, the seat is really small and uncomfortable. It wobbled on the toilet despite following the horrible installation instructions. I was so happy to return the item and would absolutely not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michel W.

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this toilet seat since I went to Japan two years ago. I do not regret this purchase in the slightest. I use it (even when I don't really need to) and it's a splash at parties. Ha ha. I highly recommend reading the maintenance manual and cleaning the components regularly to get the full life out of the product. I do not have a TOTO toilet, but had no trouble with the installation. We did replace the water pipe at the connection to the wall with a shorter one and installed a power outlet closer to the toilet to hide the cable, otherwise, everything we needed was included with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best kinda clean
customer_reviews.text: I must have a Toto washlet in every home I own. This one in particular provides a comfortable spray that cleans well. Don’t expect to get dry without first patting dry with TP though. Remote is touch sense and sometimes doesn’t read my finger so I have to hit multiple times or maybe I should read instructions to do it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Miss the mark spraying on some users and not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, but my wife and 9 year old daughter claim it misses the mark spraying them. The sprayer is non adjustable so users must force themselves to move into uncomfortable positions to use. My wife says the bidet feature misses mark badly and is next to useless. Everyone does like the heated seat.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Option for a Bidet
customer_reviews.text: This washlet was recommended by a urologist and friend. It was very simple to install and has worked flawlessly since the install. It is comfortable for myself and my wife. We are not big people and it fits us just right. I can see that a larger person might have issues with the seat. The washing actions are excellent and the drying is adequate. Temperature control is easy. I would highly recommend this for anyone dealing with urinary tract infections or someone wanting added comfort and feeling of clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Arnoldi

customer_reviews.title: There are better ones
customer_reviews.text: Thus is my third bidet and I would rank this one number three. Remote is difficult to use and the sprays are weak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered TOTO
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the changes made to the TOTO washlet over the past 15 years. I had one installed in master bath when I built my house and the new one offers many more advantages. I think it even cleans better if that's possible. Was debating on putting this on my downstairs toilet, now I wish I'd done this sooner. No worries about TP shortages in the future, since I my stash will probably now last for at least 4-5 years.
customer_reviews.author: chaslady

customer_reviews.title: My thoughts on the John
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first one I had ordered because It did not work. However this one did and we are so far happy. We have 2 others of an older model for years with no issues. Im not happy with the new remote though it is smaller and has an up to date style. But in fairness I am accustom to the old so comfortable with it and my complaints could be due to change.
customer_reviews.author: old dude

customer_reviews.title: Great invention, but needs its own circuit
customer_reviews.text: I had the opportunity to experience the use of Washlet toilet seats on a trip to Japan and have been wanting one ever since. I finally went ahead and ordered it, only to find out that it is best that it has its own circuit. Once that was addressed, though, I think the overall installation was easy enough. I am very happy with my purchase. I recently took a short trip and missed not having it while I was away. Being able to stay clean throughout the day seems like a healthy thing to do.
customer_reviews.author: fan143

customer_reviews.title: Beyond what we imagined!
customer_reviews.text: TOTO! Where have you been all our lives!!! We bought with our 90 year old mother in law in mind. We decided to get us one too. I never want to ever go anywhere else! This seat is beyond amazing!!!! I have stomach issues, this thing has changed my life. We are amazed at how much toilet paper we are saving!! This is a life changer!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. In fact, I bought two of them. I love everything about them from how they operate to just about any adjustment (heat, power, angle of spray), you can think of. The instruction book is really really helpful and I've used it many times to understand all the things I can program. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Adoorbell

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Says
customer_reviews.text: The bidet toilet seat works exactly right. A plumber did the installation and to help insure things would go right I replaced a Kholer toilet and ordered from a local store a new Toto toilet which was on sale. The plumber said he has installed a number of these bidets so that was no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rohn

customer_reviews.title: This model built different from prior purchased one.
customer_reviews.text: This Toto bidi is built deferentially from previous one we ordered. Remote not well built as the previous one. Function working. The top model was not in stock so we ordered this one. Needed my wife’s help to remove old Toto that died after 5 years. Install requires following instruction booklet & a second person.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. C. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhh...You will love feeling so clean.
customer_reviews.text: Toto makes great toilets and toilet bidets. I was not disappointed with the Washlet Bidet toilet seat. I took the advice of others and did not get the automatic seat feature because they found the seat is always going up and down when you walk into the bathroom and most times you go in and don’t need to use the toilet. Easy to install and easy to use. Top quality and well engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this Washlet Seat in anticipation of a full bathroom remodel. I was worried that it would not fit on my current 1980 toilet. It fit and was easy to install. You do need to have a GFC receptacle within 3 feet of the commode for the features on the seat to work. Don't know why I waited so long to add this to my life!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte U

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the more expensive model and it shows. There is real quality here. It freaks out our cat, though. He cannot figure out how that thing knows he is approaching and it automatically turns itself on.
customer_reviews.author: Tobradex

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I had always wanted one of these but held off because of cost. Toilet paper shortage gave me a reason to purchase. Now that I have it, I know I should have bitten the bullet sooner and purchased it long ago. It is very well built. Not flimsy at all. Love all the features. Heated seat Unlimited warm water Air drying feature - no longer need Toilet paper Night light Self cleaning Deodorizing Programmable settings Not disappointed in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Llowllah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The Toto washet is a fantastic product. Elegant design, high end technology that does what it says it will do. Easy to install on existing toilets as a replacement lid. Works flawlessly, much more sanitary .. I may never buy a roll of toilet paper again!
customer_reviews.author: world traveler

customer_reviews.title: It does not justify it`s price.
customer_reviews.text: The installation was not easy. I had a problem with it due to the leaking attachment to the toilet plumbing. The toilet seat is not comfortable. The prewash is good and the lighted toilet bowl when you enter the bathroom is also a good feature. But for the price, this washlet is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could have imagined
customer_reviews.text: This is revolutionary for us...we have been talking about it for a year or so, and decided to go ahead in light of the TP shortages. Very easy to install. The remote takes a bit of getting used to, but it’s not bad. I thought It would be ok, but would still need to clean up after, but that is not the case. Straight up life changing for us, can’t express enough how much we like this product. Hoping it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: AH Florida

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This bidet seat is really great. Installation was straight-forward and we haven't had any issues with it after having it for a couple of months. My hubby really enjoys a warm seat in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: South Bay Sales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lived in Japan for 9 years....not sure why I waited 4 years to have these installed stateside....they are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: PNW buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Works as advertised.  Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Well made. Good price. Works as advertised. Simple installation as a retrofit to an existing toilet. Need power source near toilet. After that, plug it in and it’s ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great bidet toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Toto toilet bidet seat - love it!! I would like to have this bidet seat on every toilet in my house - but too expensive
customer_reviews.author: Mormick

customer_reviews.title: Just like in Japan!
customer_reviews.text: Ad, picture and information are all accurate. A pleasure to have!
customer_reviews.author: JRD

customer_reviews.title: Came with missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This is the first order I got that came with missing parts... It looks to be a used one, so I returned it. my replacement order review O you need to see that one before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam7116

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had got it years ago
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, excellent cleaning. Drying a bit slower than expected but not a real issue. Remote easy to use, may be a bit small for people with large fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trust me, I’m a doctor.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for all manners and matters of perineal care. I never want to use facilities anywhere else, now.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A Morse

customer_reviews.title: Great, buy your own washers for the connection
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, however I got a bad washer, and had to hire a plumber for an extra $200. For nearly $1000, I would expect their plumbing supplies to be perfect. Regardless I am very happy with the product over all
customer_reviews.author: A. Man

customer_reviews.title: Great for aging "bottom line"
customer_reviews.text: It is relatively easy to install. Pictorial instruction at first confusing and overwhelming, but after few minutes of study I get familiarized with logic. Same for operating instruction.
customer_reviews.author: S. Etin

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this buy!
customer_reviews.text: This bidet is awesome!! Both my hubby and I love it! We don’t use near the toilet paper we use to and walk away fresh. Love the individual settings.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The expense of adding an AC outlet by the toilet plus help from a plumber to install (not difficult- I just didn’t trust myself) added up. But (Butt?) all very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rogers

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good. easy installation. But I wish the water wash pressure is stronger and the wash position could be more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: CityPig

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom luxury
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my former Toto washlet. I love it. The heated seat is absolutely wonderful especially in the winter! All of the cleaning features work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cheslock

customer_reviews.title: Better Than a Bidet
customer_reviews.text: I intended to put in a bidet, but my plumber suggested this instead. Warm seat, warm water, warm air, and it deodorizes and even cleans itself without added chemicals. And it’s much less expensive. What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.author: JChappell

customer_reviews.title: It's great!!
customer_reviews.text: This item is superb. It performs way beyond my expectations. The only thing that needs to improve is the installation instructions; they are a bit unclear and the video posted on line is somewhat misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel E. Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Who Does #2 Work For?
customer_reviews.text: We renovated the entire house, and this is by far our favorite part. It’s the little things. Pricey but so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Whats NOT to like with a TOTO washlet!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny... We did not install this, we hired a plumber. Amazing! GO check it out!
customer_reviews.author: beebee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about how much I love this toilet seat! So nice to have a warm seat in the winter. Works perfectly and I had highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Russell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE TOTO WASHLET!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this TOTO. #1 BRAND in Japan. I used 19Y for 1st WASHLET. Easy to install and use. Very clean and comfortable. I would recommend to anyone. Once you have one of these, you will not go back to toilet paper again.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Installing is not as easy as it looks like it should be.
customer_reviews.text: Function and design are great! I have owned them for years, everyone should.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Have been waiting to get this for some time. Glad I did my homework as this is exactly what I wanted. I really like that the water is always the right temperature.
customer_reviews.author: S Bryden

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! This will pretty much clean your soul! Every home should have this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! Yes it's "pricey" but worth it. Remote control toilet seat! How Cool is that?
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised ... Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, took a bit to go through the instructions - but works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: cklunt

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these for years. In fact, I had an electrical outlet installed 6 or 7 years ago for one. I finally decided to go ahead and get one when so many people are hoarding toilet paper. So far, I am really happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Quilt Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Clean and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed by a contractor who didn’t have any complaints with the installation. I love my washlet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Thurlo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Live this Toto. This is my second one for the guest bathroom. Once you have one of these, you will not go back to toilet paper again.
customer_reviews.author: Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Get one, you will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: We replaced an old toto bidet . This new one is improved and wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for an 8 year old Toto bidet seat. It was so easy to install and works wonderfully! I recommend this product. Make sure it will fit on your toilet. We have a Toto toilet that fits it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Quilter Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the S500e modern look to replace a broken 5-year old S350e classic look. It's better and looks much than the original. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: FoxOne

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: The use is obvious. What's important is that it works exactly the way it is advertised. It is a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lurie

customer_reviews.title: This has been the absolute best home improvement addition that we've done in years !
customer_reviews.text: For the ultimate in comfort, hygiene, and cleanliness, This is better than we could have imagined !
customer_reviews.author: Fred Silberman

customer_reviews.title: When pooping is a pleasure
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST purchase I have ever made! I highly recommend everyone to get thi!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat
customer_reviews.text: The seat is great. I do not know why softness is a rating item. The heated seat is great and once you understand where to sit and how to use the remote it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with our purchase. The seat has a little higher rise than were used to, but you get under to the difference quickly. Love the heated seat!
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love my TOTO Washlet seat
customer_reviews.text: Love my TOTO Washlet seat! The heated seat and adjustable spray setting are my favorite part about this product. This has definitely improved my bathroom experience and I always want my guests to try it out. Would love to buy one for my other bathroom as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Toto product and very good seller
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Toto product. The seat is perfect and meat all my expectations. Very good and fast delivery. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dvoyakin Maksim

customer_reviews.title: a+
customer_reviews.text: i will eventually get one for every toilet at home and one for my office bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Nikki r

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! Toto is the best !
customer_reviews.text: Totally love it , and can’t imagine my life without it !
customer_reviews.author: Jon&Tati

customer_reviews.title: Clean as a whistle.
customer_reviews.text: This really does the job. Easy to install and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Japanese Paperless toilets are the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Safe, clean, oderless, warm and sanitary, a delight to use.
customer_reviews.author: RandyArena

customer_reviews.title: A nice system. I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: The remote keypad should stay lit when the system is activated so you can see in the dark which keys you want to press when the time is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Easy to install. Low profile. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing!! Not sure how I lived so long without it!
customer_reviews.author: LL Menefee

customer_reviews.title: There’s a reason Toto leads the field!
customer_reviews.text: This Washlet does it all. Works well quietly! Highly recommend especially @ Black Friday prices!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Wilson

product_meta.title: TOTO SW3044#01 S500E Electronic Bidet Toilet Cleansing, Instantaneous Water, EWATER Deodorizer, Warm Air Dryer, and Heated Seat, Elongated Classic, Cotton White
product_meta.description:
Color:Cotton White| Size:Elongated Classic



TheTOTO WASHLET S500e Elongated Electric Bidet Toilet Seat with EWATER+ and Classic Lidis an electronic luxury seat that cleanses you with warm water, providing an exceptionally clean feeling. Instead of traditional toilet paper that can sometimes be rough and often ineffective, theWASHLETquickly provides comfortable warm water cleansing at the touch of a button. A once mundane trip to the bathroom can become aspa-like experiencewith aWASHLET.

TheWASHLETfeatures TOTO's technologically advanced EWATER+ system which uses electrolyzed water generated by a technologically advanced process, transforming the water into a safe and powerful compound. By misting the bowl after every use, theEWATER+technology helps to keep your toilet bowl clean and hygienic without any extra harsh chemicals. TOTO's advanced PREMIST technology prevents toilet bowl waste buildup by using incoming water supply to spray the bowl before every use and help keep it clean. TheTOTO WASHLET S500eis operated by a luxury style illuminated touch-activated remotewith 2 user memory to save preferred settings. TheWASHLETfeatures5 spray settings, dryer, air purification, heated seat, and instantaneous water heating. The newly redesigned lid style resides flush with the toilet bowl, providing astreamlined look and giving the impression of an integrated system. The minimalistic display provides a more subdued appearance to yourWASHLET.

TheWASHLETreduces the need for toilet paper, saving trees and water used to manufacture each roll. As we get older, our mobility can deteriorate and make it increasingly hard to clean ourselves after toileting. Medical conditions and debilitating illnesses can make using the bathroom without assistance almost impossible. With aWASHLET, you canincrease your independenceandfeel cleanerwith just one touch of a button. Includes mounting and connection hardware.
feature_bullets: A REFRESHING CLEAN FOR EVERYONE - Instant and continuous warm water stream will last as long you need it; AIR-IN WONDER WAVE provides a gentle, yet effective clean every time by infusing air into each droplet; Oscillating and pulsating functions

STEP INTO A LAVISH STANDARD OF LIVING – SoftClose heated bidet seat provides consistent warmth coverage over full seat surface; Air deodorizer neutralizes bathroom odors with powerful air filters; Adjustable warm air dryer provides easy clean up

CLEAN INNOVATIONS OFFER PEACE OF MIND - PREMIST helps prevent waste from adhering by misting the toilet bowl before each use; EWATER+ cleans the inside and outside of the wand before and after use and helps to clean the toilet bowl upon departure

EMBRACE YOUR UNIQUENESS - The convenient remote allows users to control and set personalized water cleansing settings. Provides luxury and cleanliness at your fingertips; 2 user memory settings for quick access

EXPERIENCE EVERYDAY EXCELLENCE – 50 Million WASHLET users agree TOTO electric bidet toilet seats are trusted and dependable with high-quality design for long lasting benefits; Easy, do-it-yourself installation; Top notch customer service support

specifications.Included Components: Electronic bidet seat, Tee-connector, Remote control with batteries, Mounting bracket
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
